definitions.definition: The period of time immediately following a marriage.
A trip taken by a newly married couple during this period.
definitions.example: We went to Greece for our honeymoon.

definitions.definition: A period of goodwill at the beginning of a new term or relationship (e.g. towards a newly elected politician or in respect of a new business arrangement).
definitions.example: Now that the honeymoon is over, it’s time for us to get down to the business at hand.

definitions.definition: To have a honeymoon (a trip taken by a couple after wedding).
definitions.example: My parents honeymooned at Niagara falls.
